synos.tran: 竞技场；[建]圆形露天剧场；古罗马剧场

remMethod.val: amphi (两者) + theater (剧院) → 古罗马的竞技场有两个剧院大小 → 竞技场

words.tran: 圆形剧场；阶梯教室（等于amphitheater）

trans.tranCn: 古罗马的圆形剧场， 竞技场， 似圆形剧场的场所
trans.tranOther: a building, usually circular or oval, in which tiers of seats rise from a central open arena, as in those of ancient Rome
